summary: Turns Ironback Hideout into a fully navmeshed player home.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

Ironback Hideout, part of the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Ironback_Hideout]vanilla game[/url], is a destroyed house to the northwest of Solitude, and east of the Steed Stone. I personally liked the location, and set it upon myself to rebuild the house and make it inhabitable again.

The house is simple, with a small bookshelf, a weapon plaque, a mannequin, and a wood chopping block. There are also two corundum ore veins nearby. I'll admit my main motivation for building this was trying out a hidden door, which can be seen in the pictures; this leads to a basement with all smithing amenities, as well as enchanting and alchemy tables.

As far as I could see, there are no bounties or quests regarding this location, but just in case, I moved the bandits and their locked chest not too far away, and left the copy of the Pickpocket skill book Beggar on top of the crates near the door.

[u][b]Notes[/b][/u]
I originally made this mod for the Steam Workshop. Link [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=119253788]here[/url]. To install, place the files in your 'SteamSteamAppsCommonSkyrimData' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
